      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(DataOutputStream output,
                        String string)
        Method that starts up a separate thread to send a message to the connected Server/socket.
        Parameters:
        output - Which DataOutputStream to send through
        string - What String you want to send through the DataoutputStream

      • run

        public void run()
        Starts through Main.java when we start up a new Thread, because it implements Runnable. Pretty much everything here is the graphical user interface.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
